mapper.select: SELECT * FROM recommend WHERE type in (select type from (select type from recommend where telNumber=#{telNumber} GROUP BY type order by count(type) DESC limit 0,3)tt)
select * from recommend where telNumber=#{telNumber} order by count desc limit 0,3
select recommend.* from recommend,`user` where recommend.telNumber = `user`.telNumber and `user`.sex=#{sex} and `user`.degree=#{degree} and `user`.college=#{college} order by count desc LIMIT 0,3
